actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to simplify Federal oil and gas revenue distributions, and for other purposes.
short_title: Mineral Revenue Payments Clarification Act of 1999

summary.text: Mineral Revenue Payments Clarification Act of 1999 - Amends the Mineral Leasing Act regarding the sharing of onshore mineral and geothermal revenues between the Federal government and the States to declare that the amount of payments to the States shall not be reduced by costs incurred by the United States.

titles.title: Mineral Revenue Payments Clarification Act of 1999
A bill to simplify Federal oil and gas revenue distributions, and for other purposes.
